title: Villains & Vigilantes (Eclipse)
description:
The ECUP pukes blood, bumps twice and prepares for the day-shift with 'Villains and Vigilantes'!

Mickiepedia, which is O so fine, doesn't understand:

Villains and Vigilantes (abbreviated as V&V) is a superhero-themed role-playing game which competed primarily with Champions and Superworld in the early to mid-1980s. Villains and Vigilantes was the first role-playing game, designed by Jack Herman and Jeff Dee, featuring illustrations by Dee. Fantasy Games Unlimited published the first edition of Villains and Vigilantes in 1979. 

This four-issue mini was written by Jack Herman and Jeff Dee and illustrated by Jeff Dee, and featured the Crusaders against the Crushers. Here are the names of some of the characters involved:

Shocker [Johnny Shakura]; Hornet; Manta-Man; Marionette; Manstar; Stormlord; Mace; Enforcer; Shatterman; Condor; Blizzard; Bull; Evergreen; Temper; Dreamweaver; Hauntress; Mocker

Mmmmmmmmmanstar.


Thank you creative team! Thank you scanners! Get it, seed it!
